name: 21.16-Khmer: Load-graph
description: Load sequences into the compressible graph format plus optional tagset

parameters.name: Unique
parameters.description: Approximate number of unique kmers in the input set

parameters.name: Threads
parameters.description: Number of simultaneous threads to execute

parameters.name: Max memmory
parameters.description: Maximum amount of memory to use for data structure

parameters.name: No tagset
parameters.description: Do NOT construct tagset while loading sequences

parameters.name: Help
parameters.description: Show the help message and exit
